About Me

Who am I , and what I do

Chef Itamar Alon

Israeli chef Itamar Alon is renowned for infusing Middle Eastern flavors into his culinary creations, crafting dishes that transcend borders. Despite his youthful appearance, he brings decades of culinary wisdom to his kitchen in Tel Aviv, where he continues to inspire and innovate.
